job.title: Data Center Engineer
job.description:
Kelly IT is recruiting for a
Data Center Engineer
( 6+ Months: Contract )
opportunity with a growing and dynamic company located in Montgomery, TX (On-site position – No remote)!
Requirements and Qualifications:
Completed study (university) of electrical engineering or refrigeration engineering or constructional engineering or comparable education
6 years of Data Center Engineering experience
Many years of professional experience or activity in the field of activity/area of responsibility also in an international or intercultural environment
Many years of consulting experience in strategic projects (e.g. in flexible organizations) and complex processes
Knowledge in business administration
Experience in customer relationship management
Experience in the business processes of customers
Experience in negotiations with customers at different management levels
Experience in technical management
Competent knowledge in fields of high available power supply and secured cooling supply
This position requires working on-site in Downers Grove, IL (no remote work)
If you meet the qualifications please send your resume directly to: Miguel.Cruz@kellyit.com or, if you know of anyone who meets these qualifications and would like to take advantage of this great opportunity, please refer them to us!
